<h1>Arts and entertainment</h1>
<p><img width="220" alt="Arts out West" class="ImmControlAlign_Right" title="Arts out West" src="/images/artsoutwest06_polyjesters.jpg" height="146"/>There is help
available for artists and groups through our&nbsp;<a href="/leisure-and-culture/arts-and-entertainment/arts-development-in-allerdale.aspx">Arts development service</a>&nbsp;who is
also&nbsp;able to signpost you to other organisations offering
opportunities and information on a range of arts activities in the
borough.</p>
<p>There is also information on:</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="/leisure-and-culture/arts-and-entertainment/arts-development-in-allerdale/arts-funding-sources.aspx">Arts funding sources</a></li>
<li><a href="/leisure-and-culture/arts-and-entertainment/arts-development-in-allerdale/allerdale-arts-links.aspx">The Arts in Cumbria and Beyond!</a></li>
</ul>
